group_1.textCenter: ...Am I gonna get screwed over too...?@I'm behind on my payments...

group_1.textRight: That sounds interesting.
Let us hear more details too.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Well, we've already heard most of it@from others, you know.
Y-you two...
I have nothing to tell you.@What you've heard from others is also a lie.

group_1.textRight: Is that really true?
If it's Hanna asking, anyone will easily@spill everything.

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: Tell us every single thing you are hiding!
Master... That's a big bag.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
Y-you're...here.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I'm here... *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: ...What's with that appearance?

group_1.textRight: Master, what's in that bag...?

group_1.textLeft: Just belongings.@I'm going far away due to my main job.
Sorry, but I'll leave the rest to you.

group_1.textRight: We can't let you go!

group_1.textLeft: ...You.

group_1.textRight: Master, we've heard everything.
Even the shady stuff that happened here.
Fruit punch... Right?@It was actually a secret word.

group_1.textLeft: ...What are you talking about?

group_1.textRight: You don't need to hide it.@We've really heard everything.
Well, we've already sent the others ahead@to the police.
There's no way to verify it though.

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you fucking kidding me?@Don't make fun of adults!

group_1.textRight: That's something a righteous adult would say.
...Not what a serial attacker would say, at least.

group_1.narration: "You were originally doing some shady shit here,@but then you got into a dispute with a customer@who didn't pay you well...@You got mad and struck them from behind@in the darkness."

group_1.textRight: You also collected money then, right?@It's more like robbery than a serial attack...

group_1.narration: "Well, anyway, you wanted to hide the crime.@No, even if you couldn't hide it, you wanted@something to fool the investigators...@And that's when Sena was out standing@in front of this store."
"You had her play that role for you,@making her work at this almost unused cafe."
"In reality, nobody knew what was happening, right?@You didn't use it for anything but dealings, did you?"

group_1.textRight: Thanks to that, the cookware was in shambles.@Like the saucepans and all.

group_1.textLeft: Hm, I haven't taken care of them@since I bought them for the shop.

group_1.narration: "I was planning to run a cafe as a front and take@care of my real business behind the scenes...@But cafes are more exhausting to run than expected, right?@So I closed it early and just stuck to the deals."
"But when the girl there said she would work,@I just let her do what I had originally planned...@Though I never did home deliveries, I took a lot@of them just to fool her."
"And then...it's funny, isn't it?@Everyone easily fell for the rumors I spread@and started suspecting her..."

group_1.textLeft: Even though she wouldn't hurt a fly...@Hehehe.

group_1.textRight: Master, you're misunderstanding too.@I'm actually a bad person.

group_1.textLeft: A bad person? Are you referring to the fact@you ran away from home? How cute.

group_1.textRight: No, I was trying to destroy the world.
...I'm that kind of evil.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: You're babbling, but the point is that@you deceived me, right?
You made me expect so much, and then you@made me go along with your silly games...
*Giggle* How naughty.

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't know what's going on,@but what are you planning to do with that?
I'm telling you, there's no evidence.

group_1.textRight: Aren't the dealings in that bag?

group_1.textLeft: Take a look. It's genuine clothing.
You're just a kid. You wouldn't carry all that@stuff by yourself, would you?
And me, a robber?@I don't remember that! Ahahaha.

group_1.textRight: Hmmm...taking that attitude, huh?

group_1.textLeft: What's your problem? Did you think...@that I had confessed in a moment of desperation?
No, I was just rewarding you for your@detective play...
As long as there's no evidence,@my safety is assured... Ahahaha!

group_1.textRight: ...Sorry, but we're not exactly heroes of justice.
So, we don't need evidence.
Tell the police everything you did,@and have them arrest you.
Of course, forget all about us.

group_1.narration: "...Yes, that's right. I'm the culprit behind the serial attacks.@I'm also the owner of the cafe where I did illegal..."
"Yes, yes... So please, arrest me.@I'll be in trouble if you don't."

group_1.textRight: They took her away.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.

group_1.textRight: It seems like our presence hasn't been exposed.

group_1.textLeft: But... We can't stay here anymore.@The police are watching us.

group_1.textRight: I don't think we can go back to that cafe, but...
Now that you've been cleared of all charges,@maybe they'll hire us somewhere else.

group_1.textLeft: R-really...?

group_1.textRight: Everyone saw how hard you worked,@so you'll be fine.
If it wasn't okay, then people's perceptions@in this world are fucked up.

group_1.textLeft: Hanna...

group_1.narration: However, a few hours later,@another serial attack occurred in this town.
